Package ch.bt.genericRs

Class DPRangeBRCScheme

java.lang.Object
ch.bt.genericRs.DPRangeBRCScheme
All Implemented Interfaces:
TwoRoundGenericRSScheme
public class DPRangeBRCScheme extends Object implements TwoRoundGenericRSScheme
This class implements a two round RangeBRCScheme using the Differentially Private Volume Hiding SSE scheme from Patel et al. The RangeBRCScheme is based on the work from Falzon et al.
Author:
Janet Greutmann

      public List<SearchToken> trapdoor(CustomRange q)
      Specified by:
      trapdoor in interface TwoRoundGenericRSScheme
      Parameters:
      q - the range query
      Returns:

      Specified by:
      search in interface TwoRoundGenericRSScheme
      Parameters:
      searchToken - a list of search token that has been generated with trapdoor
      encryptedIndex - the encrypted index
      Returns:
